This Dell OEM Windows has Language Packs included about 1.7 GB and other OEM stuff and its working but without full activation (no Slic). Use Daz Loader

I'm guessing it's a difference in size because this is Dell OEM.

This Windows is already activated if you install it on a Dell PC with SLIC 2.1 BIOS. If you install it on something else, you'll need to find some other activation method.

It's an exact Dell OEM ISO. I just created the ISO with imgburn and uploaded to TPB.

Thank you again for sharing your bought, @ngein

ngein

can you tell us more about this dell windows 7

As I said previously, this a Dell OEM copy. It does not go to a specific laptop or desktop. It's the same on all dell Windows 7 ultimate computers. 

This will automatically activate on any Dell that already has Windows 7 because you'll have SLIC 2.1 in the bios. If you have Vista or lower, it won't activate until you mod the bios or use some other activation method. 

I can't explain the entire SLIC process so you'll need to google that.

When activated properly through SLIC 2.1 it gets Windows Updates just fine.
